name: Furble
description:
The Furble population is beginning to get crazy! Its time to cull the herd!

This is a small game I made in about a day to practice fast prototyping. It was made quickly, and with reckless abandon, which was a lot of fun. Happy to hear what you think or if there are issues,  especially about portability.  Always looking to improve my skills. Have Fun! Play safe! :)
